channel.title: Need help making an item
channel.description: OK so I wanted to make a ring that when worn gives infinite hp so how can I do this?

item.title: Need help making an item
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) // this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("USERNAME")) {
and you do the rest i dont spoonfeed

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item
item.dc:creator: @Burnzcanzpwnz Burnzcanzpwnz
item.description:
@Burnzcanzpwnz wrote:

[quote=“dillingo, post:6, topic:284787”][quote author=Burnzcanzpwnz link=topic=376379.msg2835764#msg2835764 date=1245639582]

Ok first you’ll probably want a command for this ring. I’ll use the ‘perfect’ ring as an example. Open up your client.java and paste this in.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("InfHpRing")&& playerRights >= 2){ addItem(773,1); sendMessage("WOOT, a infinite hp ring :O!"); sendMessage("Use this ANYWHERE to PK and you're DEMOTED"); }

Then paste this in

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773){ if(IsDead); IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }

OK but where at in client.java?
[/quote]

The command code can go with the rest of your commands. For the second code, search for if (playerHasItemAmount(793, 1) && q3stage == 6) {
and right ABOVE that paste it.[/quote]
Thanks it worked btw I need to ask you something I want an npc to say the owner is off or on how do I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

[quote=“Burnzcanzpwnz, post:4, topic:284787”][quote author=dillingo link=topic=376379.msg2835731#msg2835731 date=1245637743]
Ok first you’ll probably want a command for this ring. I’ll use the ‘perfect’ ring as an example. Open up your client.java and paste this in.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("InfHpRing")&& playerRights >= 2){ addItem(773,1); sendMessage("WOOT, a infinite hp ring :O!"); sendMessage("Use this ANYWHERE to PK and you're DEMOTED"); }

Then paste this in

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773){ if(IsDead); IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }
[/quote]
OK but where at in client.java?[/quote]

The command code can go with the rest of your commands. For the second code, search for if (playerHasItemAmount(793, 1) && q3stage == 6) {
and right ABOVE that paste it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making an item

item.description:
@Adelmas wrote:

Put the command in the commands meathod, and playerequipment in the playerequipment method.
